content.title: ReferenceError: Cannot access 'updateFile' before initialization
content.body:
View details in Rollbar: [https://app.rollbar.com/a/thomas.iniguez/fix/item/FirstProject/13](https://app.rollbar.com/a/thomas.iniguez/fix/item/FirstProject/13)

```

ReferenceError: Cannot access 'updateFile' before initialization
  File "C:\Users\alpha\youtube-public\src\index.js", line 255, in Object.<anonymous>
  File "node:internal/modules/cjs/loader", line 1484, in Module._compile
  File "node:internal/modules/cjs/loader", line 1564, in Module._extensions..js
  File "node:internal/modules/cjs/loader", line 1295, in Module.load
  File "node:internal/modules/cjs/loader", line 1111, in Module._load
  File "node:electron/js2c/node_init", line 2, in c._load
  File "node:internal/modules/esm/translators", line 350, in cjsLoader
  File "node:internal/modules/esm/translators", line 286, in ModuleWrap.<anonymous>
  File "node:internal/modules/esm/module_job", line 234, in ModuleJob.run
  File "node:internal/modules/esm/loader", line 473, in async ModuleLoader.import
```
content.author: alphaleadership

acceptanceCriteria: The application starts without encountering a 'ReferenceError: Cannot access 'updateFile' before initialization'.
The 'updateFile' variable or function is properly defined and accessible at line 255 in 'src/index.js'.
The core functionality that relies on 'updateFile' operates as expected after the fix.

fileActions.explanation: To understand the declaration and usage context of 'updateFile' around line 255 and identify why it's being accessed before initialization.
